Meet the locals and get your tools. Sit down or stand and wait for pike, salmon, and other smaller or bigger fish to swallow the hook. 
Show everyone your trophies. Catch fish and artifacts with a fishing net or a suitable rod.

Learn more

Valuable knowledge will allow you to complete the biology report successfully.

Relax and unwind. Feel the climate and peaceful, quiet atmosphere of the island.

This bundle includes eleven colors for your fly fishing rod.

Key Features:

 - More than 50 species of fish
 - 3 different fishing techniques
- No time limits (play at your own pace)
70070000017974.intro: Visit the remarkable Isle of Jura and catch some delicious fish!
70070000017974.name: Isle of Jura Fishing Trip Extended Edition

70070000017975.description:
This edition contains everything you need for the complete Cassette Beasts experience. Set out to explore the world of New Wirral with max expression, unique apparel, and accessories in the Cosplay Pack!

This edition includes:

* Cassette Beasts
* Cassette Beasts: Cosplay Pack DLC
70070000017975.name: Cassette Beasts: Deluxe Edition

70070000017979.description:
Get ready for the thrilling gaming experience with the Johnny Trigger Action Collection! This bundle combines two action-packed games that will keep you on the edge of your seat. 

Take on the role of the stylish, deadly and smooth as a billiard ball Johnny Trigger - International Man of Mayhem! 

Do you have what it takes to bring down the underground world of the mafia? “Less talk, more bullets” – that’s Johnny’s motto as he runs, jumps, spins, slides and keeps on shooting till every bad guy’s bitten the dust.

Take down every bad guy in your path and collect rewards as you navigate through challenges that await you at every turn. Don't wait around – those bad guys won't defeat themselves!

The excitement doesn't end there. In the sequel, Johnny Trigger: Sniper, Johnny returns to shake up the sniper game genre.

The stakes are high as your opponents fight back, but you have an ample supply of bullets in your magazine. With each headshot, you'll prove your skills and make your mark as the best sniper around. Earn money from completing missions and unlock a wide range of powerful weapons, from guns to rocket launchers and even assault rifles. Collect golden keys in order to exchange them for extra money or details of the super gun. Remember, you're not alone in this world – protect innocent civilians, defeat menacing mafia bosses, and make every shot count.
70070000017979.intro: My Name is Trigger... Johnny Trigger
70070000017979.name: Johnny Trigger Action Collection

70070000017983.description: Clumsy Rush: Ultimate Guys GOTY Edition is a fun-centric party game which throws you (along with your friends) into a series of challenges and races throughout randomly generated tracks. Enjoy new decorations and get ready for loads of fun.
70070000017983.intro: Dive deep into a new adventure in Clumsy Rush: Ultimate Guys.
70070000017983.name: Clumsy Rush: Ultimate Guys GOTY Edition

70070000017988.description:
*You can also buy the products in the Season Pass individually. Please be careful not to buy duplicates.
*You must have purchased the game separately to use this product. Please also update the game to the latest version.

Description:
3 costume packs.

Season Pass includes:
・Tail Concerto Costume Pack
・Steampunk Costume Pack (Releases in September 2023)
・Animal Costume Pack (Releases in November 2023)

*Any release date may be subject to change.
70070000017988.intro: A dramatic simulation RPG depicting a pursuit rife with hope and despair!
70070000017988.name: Fuga: Melodies of Steel 2 - Season Pass

70070000017990.description:
Pour the potion into the cauldron, throw in the clover, bone and feather, stir and voila - you have a cute Mixie!

Combine other ingredients to create Mixies with different features: winged, horned, spotted, furry... the possibilities are endless.

Let your Mixie friends explore the mysterious island, find hidden treasures, repair the magical portal and collect new ingredients to create even more adorable pets. Over time, you might even discover a way to combine Mixies with each other.

Mystical Mixing is an enchanting simulation game that will immerse you in a world of magic, alchemy and wonder. So grab your cauldron and start the adventure!

In this edition you will also receive:
-five mysterious elements that will allow you to create a Mixie with new special features and colors.
-15 speedup potions to help your Mixies explore the island and find treasures even faster.
70070000017990.intro: Enter a world of magic and wonder with Mystical Mixing.
70070000017990.name: Mystical Mixing: Arcane Edition

70070000017991.description:
Many adventures await!
Once upon a time, two children, a boy, and a girl found two unique toys - a robot and an alpacorn. These magically came to life to become our heroes' best friends! Together they experience amazing stories about friendship, helping others, and the joy of life!

Comics to color!
From the beginning of the XX century, coloring books are a great way for children to spend their time! Not only young ones will raise their creativity, learn manual skills but also discover colors and shapes! It is also a good way to settle the nerves, calm down and relax for energetic kiddos!

Complete experience
In the Comics library, you’ll find 92 great illustrations and the possibility to create your comic book!

Prologue
Check how our adventures start! Play in space with the robot or discover how the princess from the faraway kingdom and her favorite alpacorn are spending their free time.

Time for the Hero and the Robot
Together with the boy and the robot, we’ll go on many adventures: we meet a dinosaur who likes candy, enjoy a sea trip, and try to save a playful cat. All that in many surprising places!

My Friend, Alpacorn
This time we will accompany a girl and her unusual friend - Alpacorn (half alpaca, half unicorn). We’ll travel to the land of sweets, into the deeps of the sea to become mermaids and play on the snow and even explore space!

Drawing Without Borders
Create what’s comes to your mind! You have 8 blank comics to fill in this one - use painting tools to create your adventures! Create new characters, throw in cute animals, and make up amazing stories! Oh, and remember to add comic book stickers!

This bundle lets you try out the new whiteboard set and drawings.

Features:
— Great fun for children - and an excellent way to introduce them to comics.
— 23 stories, each consists 4 graphics - making a total of 92 coloring pages!
— Best tool for children to express their creativity - while improving their motor skills and awareness of colors and shapes.
— Beautiful drawings - created by an artist with many years of experience in making illustrations for children.
— Stickers!
70070000017991.intro: Comic Coloring Book - Complete Edition is fun for big and small, especially for young, creative fans of comic books! Enjoy adventures, use different drawing tools and create!
70070000017991.name: Comic Coloring Book Complete Edition: COLORS Ultimate

70070000017995.description:
Shovel your way to success: go underground and dig for treasure like a mole on a mission. But don't worry, you won't get stuck in a hole - unless you forget to hire workers to boost your digging empire.

This game is the perfect blend of laziness and ambition. Your job is to sit back, relax, and let your hired diggers do the dirty work while you search for those sweet gems and diamonds. If you become the best miner around, you can even hire more gold diggers to expand your mining tycoon empire.

Game Features:
- dig, shovel, excavate, burrow and dredge a hole
- mine gems and earn money to unearth more holes
- hire workers to enable idle play
- use powerups to speedup mining or buy pets for permanent buffs
- build monuments for your glory
- play with your friend to dig even deeper!

In this bundle, you will also receive:
- adorable and powerful animal companions to your game that will give you a significant boost in coin collection
- new bonuses such as increased movement speed and diamond mining capabilities
- a one-time gift of +500 diamonds, which you can use to get your hands on one of these amazing creatures right away
70070000017995.intro: Grab a shovel and let's get digging! Join the adventure, hire miners and dig for a treasure
70070000017995.name: Dig Deep: Premium Pets Bundle

70070000017997.description:
Lets pop & move the ball and paint - you’ve got to color and paint your way across the AMAZE maze puzzles. 

Watch out! AMAZE gets harder as you play, color and paint the maze, and fill in puzzles!

Painting the maze puzzles sounds easy, but you have to be super strategic to color and fill every square.

Make sure you fill in puzzles COMPLETELY! If you don’t fill even one square, you’re stuck in the paint maze FOREVER!

Lets pop this maze with color!

Game Features:
- relaxing Classic mode
- tense Time Rush mode
- puzzling Limited Moves mode
- two player variants of each game mode
- hundreds of levels to paint and many colorful balls to unlock

In this edition you will also receive:
-extra 150 levels in Classic mode
-additional 50 levels in the more challenging Time Rush mode.
70070000017997.name: AMAZE! Time Attack Edition

70070000017998.description:
Brain Memory improves on the classic formula of memory games. It lets you increase the difficulty level at your own pace, and customize  challenges to one's taste. 

Our brains are the most important tools of the XXI century. Do your child a favor, and give thema gift that will help them reach their full potential.

Let them become masters of their own minds with the Figures Pack!

Key Features

– Improves memory
– Adorable Cards
– Adjustable difficulty level
– Relaxing music
– 8 card designs
– 20 difficulty levels
70070000017998.intro: Help your child harness the hidden potential of their mind. Use these colorfull cards to improve their memory skills.
70070000017998.name: Brain Memory Complete Edition

70070000018021.description:
These girls want to invite you into the most tempting puzzle game experience Nintendo Switch™ has to offer.

HENTAI IS ART

A familiar anime art style of Hentai Girls brings you right into the lives of these young and beautiful women. Progress through the story by solving their respective puzzles. These lovely girls will keep you company.

INCREASING DIFFICULTY

The gameplay mechanics are simple yet challenging – increasing difficulty as you progress. Their lovely outfit might distract you... so maybe help them get rid of it? Every success on your part will make them happier.

In this bundle, you will help Yui, one of the girls from the main game, clean and throw away unnecessary things.

Key Features:

- Hand-drawn Hentai art
- Relaxing music track
- Simple gameplay mechanics
- Unique premise
70070000018021.intro: Immerse yourself in the captivating world inhabited by Yui, Shirayuki, and Etsuko.
70070000018021.name: Hentai Girls Deluxe Edition

70070000018023.description:
Pick your favorite

Choose one of the heros and challenge other players in this family-friendly version of Chess. Thanks to the cartoony graphics, this variation can be enyojed by people of all ages.

Hone your skills

If you want to improve on your own, try out one of five difficulty options and play with an NPC. Find your favorite opening and improve with every game. If you are looking for a real challenge try out the expert mode.

This bundle includes 3 DLC skins for the chessboard.

Key features

- local multiplayer
- family friendly
- balanced gameplay
- charming aesthetic
- invigorating music track
70070000018023.intro: Prepare for loads of fun with this cartoon version of the most popular board game in the world.
70070000018023.name: Family Chess Amazing Edition

70070000018047.description:
House Flipper is a unique chance to become a one-man renovation crew. Buy, repair and remodel devastated houses. Give them a second life and sell them at a profit!


DLC Pets
Will you find a place for someone special in your recently renovated property? Thanks to Pets DLC you'll have a chance to take care of a lovely companion and have a wonderful time together!

Your new furry buddy represents one of thirteen popular dog or cat breeds, but that's not the end of great news! The DLC will also allow you to choose between other animal species like rabbits, turtles, parrots, or hamsters!

Take in your new pet, look after it and make it feel loved.
Be sure to involve plenty of playtime, teach it, and make it feel comfortable in a new home! Create a unique relationship with your adorable housemate!
70070000018047.intro: Experience House Flipper with addition of Pet Companions!
70070000018047.name: House Flipper: Pets Bundle

70070000018049.description:
Look out! This pizzeria will soon become the talk of the town!

Well... at least that's the plan. 

Your customers are already queuing up, so you'll have to serve them as quickly as possible. However, that's easier said than done!

Everyone's in a hurry and you'll have to prepare each order correctly, or else your customers are going to get crossed!

Give it your all and you'll come out on top!

IN PIZZA BAR TYCOON YOU WILL FIND:

* 60 levels to explore, 70+ dishes to serve.
* Great cartoonish graphics, music and sound effects.
* Countless upgrades you can apply to ingredients and bar decorations.
* 47 Achievements to complete.
* Easy to play and hard to master.

This bundle includes base game, Expansion Pack #1 and Multiplayer Mode with:
* 20 new levels
* local multiplayer gameplay mode, allowing players to team up and play together. It adds a new layer of excitement and replayability to the game, while providing a fun and engaging experience for players to enjoy with friends and family. 

NOTE: to play the Multiplayer Mode DLC, each player will need their own set of Joy-Con™ or an additional Nintendo Switch™ Pro Controller.
70070000018049.intro: Become a pizza magnate! Create the best pizza in town!
70070000018049.name: Pizza Bar Tycoon Co-op Edition

70070000018055.description:
An remarkable tale

Immerse yourself in a story of courage, love and happiness. 

You are the hero

Follow the plot to save a beautiful princess or a handsome mage from a powerful beast!

Take a look

Match colored pieces of glass to reveal the next page of adventures in one of two stories: A Bit of Horoscoping and The Lucky Knot.

Mosaic Gallery

Each picture depicts unique characters and events in the stunning style of stained glass mosaics. You will find the completed ones in one place. This makes it easy to check your progress.

Exercise your mind

Puzzles develop your concentration and spatial imagination.

This bundle includes the Artbook DLC.

Key Features:

- colorful glass mosaic style graphics
- 50 pictures to arrange
- reading mode
- 4 difficulty levels
70070000018055.intro: Enter a fantastic world full of magic and charm. Rebuild legendary tales with Mosaic Chronicles Deluxe. A new puzzle game experience awaits.
70070000018055.name: Mosaic Chronicles Deluxe Extended Edition

70070000018060.description:
Take on a series of epic battles against powerful bosses. Unlock new abilities and power-ups and become the ultimate warrior. Dodge a barrage of laser beams, and explosions and make sure YOU are the last one standing.

With its vibrant graphics, pulse-pounding soundtrack, and intuitive controls, Mixx Island Remix is a game that's easy to pick up but hard to put down. 

Whether you're a seasoned gamer or a newcomer to the world of side-scrolling games, you'll find plenty to love in this thrilling adventure.

In this bundle, in addition to the main game, you will get access to a new spring island.

Key Features:

- 2D World
- High-action gameplay
- Rewarding gameplay loop
- Cute characters
- Astounding soundtrack
- Anime style aesthetic
70070000018060.intro: Mixx Island Remix Plus is a high-energy, action-packed shooter set in a fantastic 2D world. Gather your wits, sharpen your reflexes, and prepare for the ultimate challenge.
70070000018060.name: Mixx Island: Remix Plus Ultimate Edition

70070000018064.description:
Success is at every corner

Help your child (or yourself) grow logical skills alongside cute animals. Take your time and look around the map for best routes. Make sure to consider all possibilities. Remember! Gravity is not an issue if you have the right mindset.

Multiple characters

Check out over 10 unlockable characters to accompany you. You can become a fierce shark, an angry bull, a mighty rhino or a fluffy panda.

Travel through the world

Experience all of the unique worlds alongside Mojito. Travel through an elegant garden, a desert oasis, an active vulcano, an iceberg or even a magic forest. In case the last one was not to your liking, you can also have some fun in a regular forest.

Enjoy yourself even more with the Easter and Christmas DLC included in the bundle. 

Key features:

- 60 puzzles to solve
- charming aesthetic
- 11 unique 3d cube Skins
- satisfying gameplay loop
- great challenges
70070000018064.intro: Jump into action in this quirky puzzle game. Travel the world along with an adorable cat named Mojito (or one of his friends).
70070000018064.name: Mojito the Cat Complete Edition

70070000018070.description:
Follow the rise of Sherlock Holmes and Doctor Watson from inexperienced detectives to celebrated crime-solvers with this bundle of three games.

Sherlock Holmes The Awakened
A Lovecraft meets Sherlock Holmes crossover, The Awakened puts you up against the legendary Cthulhu Mythos. Investigate a series of mysterious disappearances, apparently linked to a dark cult that worships an Ancient God. Whatever their plan is, you must put a stop to it… or face unspeakable consequences.

Sherlock Holmes: The Devil's Daughter
Play as Sherlock Holmes and use his extraordinary abilities to progress through the adventure. Freely explore several of the city's neighbourhoods in search of clues and suspects. Interrogations, combat, chases, infiltration… discover a game that is unlike any other!

Sherlock Holmes: Crimes and Punishments
Become the most celebrated detective of all time: Sherlock Holmes! Use your impressive talents as a detective to solve six thrilling and varied cases: murders, missing persons, spectacular thefts and numerous investigations that sometimes lead you into the realms of the fantastic.
70070000018070.intro: Put your intuition and logic to the test as you investigate a multitude of mind-bending and gripping cases, make your deductions and ultimately, difficult moral choices.
70070000018070.name: Famous Duo Bundle

70070000018071.description:
Immerse yourself in the terrifying universe of H.P. Lovecraft with this bundle.

The Sinking City
The Sinking City is an adventure and investigation game set in an open world inspired by the universe of H.P. Lovecraft, the master of Horror. The half-submerged city of Oakmont is gripped by supernatural forces. You're a private investigator, and you have to uncover the truth of what has possessed the city… and the minds of its inhabitants.

Sherlock Holmes The Awakened
A Lovecraft meets Sherlock Holmes crossover, The Awakened puts you up against the legendary Cthulhu Mythos. Investigate a series of mysterious disappearances, apparently linked to a dark cult that worships an Ancient God. Whatever their plan is, you must put a stop to it… or face unspeakable consequences.
70070000018071.intro: Use your mind to investigate and your willpower to resist madness.
70070000018071.name: Lovecraftian Bundle

70070000018072.description:
Jet udders

You are an animal rocket. Launch yourself and don't get shot down.

New goodies every hour

Play with the claw machine every hour, or after flying through enough levels. Get a new look for the cow with different headgear or projectiles.

Fly and shoot

Spin and change the direction of your flight. Shoot enemies with a stream of white drink to make them as gentle as sheep.

Higher, faster, forward

Use the milk or other liquids to fly away, push physical obstacles or stop your enemies. Crash through windows, gain speed and reach the finish line. Shuffle your hooves and don't hold back.

With this bundle, you get two new headgear - a banana and a crown.

Key Features:

- more than 20 cows to collect
- more than 100 levels
- shooting a stream of milk and more
- cute graphics in pastel colors
- rhythmic soundtrack in hip-hop and funky disco style
70070000018072.intro: Soar through the air and don't get milked in this cute game.
70070000018072.name: THAT'S A COW Definitive Edition

70070000018084.description:
This digital bundle contains the following games for Nintendo Switch:

Pikmin 1
A crash-landing, an uncharted planet, and a strange but exciting discovery for Captain Olimar! Rebuild his spaceship with the help of tiny plant creatures called Pikmin and explore an overgrown world in this HD version of the Nintendo GameCube classic.

Pikmin 2
A captain’s work is never done! Return to the strange planet and hunt for precious treasures, using the talents of the Pikmin and your new assistant to lighten the load in this HD version of the Nintendo GameCube classic.
70070000018084.name: Pikmin 1+2

70070000018091.description:
Pixel Paint 2 is a sequel to an extremely popular game by the same name. The rules are quite simple. Put your mind at ease, follow the numbers, and fill out every last pixel with the right color. 

It's your first step in becoming an amazing pixel artist. Choose a theme you like and sink into the wonderful world of pixels. 

Choose from a wide range of drawings, and expand your pixel art gallery with the Passion DLC!

Key Features:

-Dozens of illustrations to choose from
-Relaxing gameplay
-Adorable characters
-Easy to play
-Simplistic Design
-Charming Pixel Drawings
70070000018091.intro: Experience the pixelated sensation, beloved by thousands of people. Discover a coloring book, unlike any other.
70070000018091.name: Pixel Paint 2 Deluxe Edition

70070000018104.description:
Coloring books are a great way to spend your time. It is a good way to settle the nerves and relax! It also develops your brain... just like eating fish. Use one of the premade templates or create YOUR OWN illustrations.

Pick one of over a dozen drawings and make it your own. Chose one of the available settings and play around with these adorable characters.

This bundle lets you try out the new whiteboard set and drawings.

Key features:

- 5 different themes of drawings
- 8 tools with 24 color variations
- Cute design
- Great for all ages
70070000018104.intro: DRAW AND COLOR: KAWAII is your path into the world of adorable delicacies! Use different drawing tools and have some tasty fun!
70070000018104.name: DRAW AND COLOR: KAWAII Platinum Edition

70070000018112.description:
A party game with simple controls anyone can enjoy!
Pass around the Joy-Con™ and play with up to six players!
Experience a whole variety of intuitive, easy-to-play minigames.
Try to find your new favorite!

Party hearty with the Party Fever Pack, Party Harder Pack, Party Even Harder Pack, and Excitement Pack downloadable content bundle for Party Party Time! Let's party till we drop!
70070000018112.intro:
It's time to get this party started!
Endless fun in a bash everyone can join!
70070000018112.name: Party Party Time + Premium Pack Set

70070000018113.description:
UPGRADE YOUR ORCHARD
Sell your apples to earn money and improve your orchard. Expand your land and find new secrets. Who knows, maybe you'll make new friends along the way...

RETRO GRAPHICS
Enjoy a trip down memory lane, with stylized 2D graphics, resembling old games. If you love pixel art games, you shouldn't hesitate to try out this charming game.

CHIPTUNE MUSIC
You’ll hear a few catchy tunes to improve on your adventure. You can swap between tracks, whenever you go back into your room, for some much-needed rest.

This bundle includes Deluxe Theme Pack DLC with new colors, additional gifts, a Chicken House, and Halloween theme decorations.

KEY FEATURES
- Simple controls
- No invisible walls (only visible ones)
- Great replay value
- A pet rabbit
- Stylized 2D graphics
- Incredible music track
70070000018113.intro: Pull out weeds, plant new apple trees and gather the literal fruits of your labour. With time, you'll discover ways to make your life easier and explore this charming 2D world.
70070000018113.name: Bit Orchard: Animal Valley Happy Edition

70070000018114.description:
PLAYER’S BEST FRIEND

Raise MULTIPLE pets simultaneously! Assume the role of a responsible dog parent, ensuring that each of their needs are met. Watch them grow into adulthood.

REAL-TIME GAMEPLAY EXPERIENCE 

Neglecting your pets for a long time can make them sick or even worse. Their destiny rests firmly in the palm of your hands. When you succeed, try raising a new friend and grow your dog family.

This bundle includes a colorful set.

Key Features: 
- A wide selection of dogs to choose from 
- Engaging and soothing 
- Retro aesthetic appeal 
- Brief and gratifying
70070000018114.intro: ﻿Set off on a journey of nurturing and attending to your digital companion in Dogotchi: Virtual Pet. These charming dogs depicted in satisfying pixel art are bound to steal your heart!
70070000018114.name: Dogotchi: Virtual Pet Deluxe Edition

70070000018142.description:
The curtain rises on a new Fate, presented by TYPE-MOON and KOEI TECMO GAMES.

In this set:
- The main game
- Digital Artbook
- Soundtrack
- Season Pass (featuring 3 Additional Episodes)
- Season Pass Bonus: Hallowed Relic Sword Mountings (Equipment)

Note:
The content and release dates are subject to change without notice. Please visit the official website for more information. 
(https://www.koeitecmoeurope.com/fate-sr/)

The main game, the Season Pass, and the Digital Artbook & Soundtrack are also available for purchase separately. All items (except Season Pass Bonus) included in the Season Pass can be purchased separately at a later date. Please avoid making redundant purchases.
The Season Pass Bonus will be released on the same day as the game. Additional Episode 1 is planned to be released before the end of April 2024. Additional Episode 2 is planned to be released before the end of July 2024. Additional Episode 3 is planned to be released before the end of September 2024.
In order to play the content featured in the Season Pass, you need to reach a certain point in the game.
70070000018142.intro: “Your wish shall perish...” A Holy Grail War begins in Edo Japan.
70070000018142.name: Fate/Samurai Remnant Digital Deluxe Edition

70070000018143.description:
A revolution has come!

Enjoy every awesome feature of the nOS. Draw, write, calculate, organize your day and play around at your convenience. All the tools you need are here! 

You have the power

Brighten up your day and customize the nOS to suit your every need. Find your favorite setup and create the fantastic user experience you deserve.

This bundle includes 2 DLC: Icon Themes and Long Cat mini-game.

Key features:

- Splendid customization options
- Reliable tools (Notepad, Scetchbook, Day Planner)
- Brilliant design
- A charming puzzle game
70070000018143.intro: Engage the newest Nintendo Switch™ experience. Transform your favorite console into an amazing, and surprisingly small personal computer.
70070000018143.name: nOS new Operating System Premium Edition

70070000018144.description:
In S.N.I.P.E.R.: Hunter Scope you will shoot, you will fight, and you will win!

Play S.N.I.P.E.R., the latest sniping game where you aim, fight and destroy virtual enemies. Try different types of missions, inspired both by classic rail shooters and modern cover shooters. Fight your way out during day and night, destroy evil forces and unlock new weapons and power-ups.

Game includes:
15+ STAGES
30+ WEAPONS
30+ GALLERY ITEMS
60+ SPECIAL ACHIEVEMENTS 

Become a hunter, mount your scope, and fight for our freedom!

This bundle includes base game, Expansion Pack and Elite Arsenal with:

• With the Expansion Pack you can fight and survive the zombie apocalypse in a brand new game mode!

Unlock 3 powerful weapons to use them in the DLC and base game to improve your scores.
Play new maps or revisit old ones with new weapons.
Fill your gallery and cabinet with new models and medals.

• Want some more reliable and tested guns for your collection? With this expansion, you'll get: 
-RVL-357-WES pistol: a classic revolver with a timeless design 
-BK-47-CAM rifle: a rugged and reliable rifle inspired by the old west 
-SN-1100-TRI sniper rifle: a modern-day cowboy sniper rifle 

Conquer your enemies in the wild west style!
70070000018144.name: S.N.I.P.E.R. - Hunter Scope Gold Edition

70070000018153.description:
In addition to the full version of the game, the Deluxe Edition includes a digital art book and digital soundtrack!

Digital Deluxe Edition Contents
Game - ANONYMOUS;CODE
Interactive Digital Art Book - A BEGINNER'S GUIDE TO EARTH SIMULATOR
Full Digital Soundtrack with 52 songs - SOUND DATA LOG

Story
2037. Nakano, Tokyo. 
Pollon Takaoka is caught up in a tangle of plots as a result of his encounter with the mysterious girl Momo and faces major events that shake the world. Live the experience with Pollon, help him hack the myriad branches of reality and ""load"" the ending that saves the world!
70070000018153.intro: This is the latest work by STEINS;GATE creator Chiyomaru Shikura, in collaboration with returning staff from the Science Adventure Series.
70070000018153.name: ANONYMOUS;CODE Digital Deluxe Edition

70070000018156.description:
SOLVE THE MYSTERY
You play as multiple characters, each with their own story, and travel to actual locations in town and dark versions of them.
In this nightmare, you have to solve the murder, search for your missing sister Sarah, and complete the mysterious ritual to save the dying town. Will you be able to unravel all the dark secrets of Boreal Tenebrae?

SEARCH FOR SARAH
Explore a diseased town where everything is unusual. Strange boxes that emit hypnotic static appeared in town. Some citizens, including Sarah, have been absorbed by this mysterious object and never come back.

Boreal Tenebrae was nominated for Best Art Direction and Best Narrative at the Canadian Game Awards 2021.

In this version of the game, you will get the key to the basement of Sarah's house and find out what is hidden there.

This bundle includes DLC Colorful cards. With this, you will change the background of your inventory.

KEY FEATURES:
• Classic retro-style adventure
• Horror elements and gore
• Story-driven quests with multiple characters
• Fixed-camera
70070000018156.intro: Boreal Tenebrae will take you on a retro-style adventure, with a mysterious atmosphere and horror elements. The game is inspired by 90s classics and the best TV series.
70070000018156.name: Boreal Tenebrae Deluxe Special Edition

70070000018159.description:
Inspired by the classics, developed for the modern audiences.

A classic revenge story set in a medieval fantasy world… with a touch of deadly modern firepower just to turn things up to eleven. Fight through the armies of undead, mutants, aliens, machines and beasts in order to get back what is rightfully yours and bring some semblance of peace back to the land. Who knows - if you’re thorough enough you might even discover the history of the kingdom itself, long lost to the scholars of the realm.

Knights & Guns brings you to a dangerous world where you will fight, alongside your friend, against demons, ghouls & ghosts. Use shotguns, lasers and the power of chivalry to overcome every obstacle. Become the best version of a knight - one with a gun.

Inside the game:
•	Fight awesome bosses on various stages! 
•	Conquer the non-linear world! Rush through over 150 hand crafted stages, or enjoy the game at your own pace, looking for secrets and special routes!
•	Entire game designed for both single player or co-op multiplayer. Invite a friend at any time for some extra firepower and mayhem.
•	60 fps gameplay! Try the different modes! Hunt the monsters! Survive! Play on small, big and narrow maps!
•	Check out all the awesome suits of armor and, of course, all the GUNS! Lasers, shotguns, grenade launchers, sniper rifles... They are all here!
•	Over 30 unique guns. (That’s probably more flavors of death than flavors of ice cream you can name.)
•	Over 25 types of enemies, 5 types of mini-bosses and 3 types of bosses. Most of these come in different colors, too.
•	30 unique suits of armor for the knights. Extra protection and extra style!
•	Traps, chests, keys, scrolls of lore, books of monsters...

This bundle includes base game and Armor Pack #1 with:

•	two robust armors, expertly crafted to endure the toughest battles. Transform your knight into an indestructible guardian of justice with this stellar upgrade!
70070000018159.intro: Knight in shining armor, fight your way... with Guns!
70070000018159.name: Knights & Guns Deluxe Edition

70070000018160.description:
With nPaint, the best illustration app for Nintendo Switch™ , you'll create both simple, ordinary and professional paintings - from drawings of your favorite fairy tale characters to mind-blowing works of art.

Develop creativity

Put yourself in control and have freedom of choice. Use crayon, brush or spray paint. Paint and draw your beloved animals, holiday cards or the design of your dream living room. Become a modern Picasso and enjoy a remarkable personal gallery of your masterpieces. 

Magical experience

Choose from basic all the way to a mix of smoothly gradient alternating colors.

Innovative small, handy sketchpad or easel

Create anywhere - on the go, on a break at work, at the beach and on an airplane. Go to the next level of relaxation and indulgence. 

This bundle includes the fifth gallery expansion.

Key features:
- Essential and versatile tools in different sizes
- Mixed colors with smooth gradients in between
- Create technical drawings, birthday cards or portraits
- Tuned to you
- Unprecedented ease of use
- For everyone, regardless of age
70070000018160.intro: Wow yourself. Become an outstanding artist with nPaint.
70070000018160.name: nPaint Premium Edition

70070000018169.description:
In Dessert DIY: Nasty Edition you can make desserts and seek sweet revenge! 

Unlock mean ingredients to create desserts with a nasty surprise for the bad guys. Imagine adding cockroaches, ants, worms, and other yucky things to your ice cream and popsicles!

You can let your creativity run wild by experimenting with different flavors, syrups, and frostings. Mix and match the wicked ingredients to create the perfect balance of sweetness and grossness.
70070000018169.intro: Mix delicious and disgusting ingredients in one of the best dessert decorating games!
70070000018169.name: Dessert DIY: Nasty Edition

70070000018175.description:
Additional Character for "Goonya Monster".

Purchasing this item adds the following Buster as characters that can be used in gameplay.

- Tsukasa Tenkai/All Guys (Buster)
- Gatchman V/All Guys (Buster) 
- Mari Tomari/All Guys (Buster) 
- Meika Utai/All Guys (Buster)
70070000018175.name: Additional Character : All Guys Pack

70070000018180.description:
Fashion is better together with your friends!

Become a stylist to the models, actresses and fashion girls! Play a mix of classic arcade games where you have to cut the picture in a new game aimed for children and adults alike.


- 80 levels!
- Hundreds of mix betweens costumes, backgrounds and items!
- Photo mode!
- Three stars system, giving the game replayability!
- Affordable price!
- Aimed at kids & adults alike!
- Become friends with Fashion! 

This bundle includes base game and Extra Levels! with even more levels! Play additional awesome levels, and try your best to beat your previous scores!
70070000018180.intro: Make a Fashion Hits together with your friends!
70070000018180.name: Fashion Friends: Special Edition

70070000018183.description:
Become a modern Mozart with Piano: Learn and Play, the best piano learning app for Nintendo Switch™.

Well-known and beloved melodies

Nursery rhymes or other popular songs make time more enjoyable for children around the world. Sing and play with family, friends or at school.

A marvel of modernity

A small, handy musical instrument that you can take anywhere you want. Relax and immerse yourself in the sounds.

A magical experience

Music develops memory, motor skills and improves concentration. With its total power, you will awaken your child's creativity and sensitivity to beauty.

This bundle includes the sixth Song Pack.

Key Features:
- 8 familiar, simple songs
- free play mode
- learning mode
- mini arcade piano game
- different tempo
70070000018183.intro: Wow everyone. Become a pianist in just a few moments.
70070000018183.name: Piano: Learn and Play Premium Edition

70070000018190.description:
SOLVE THE MYSTERY
You play as multiple characters, each with their own story, and travel to actual locations in town and dark versions of them.
In this nightmare, you have to solve the murder, search for your missing sister Sarah, and complete the mysterious ritual to save the dying town. Will you be able to unravel all the dark secrets of Boreal Tenebrae?

SEARCH FOR SARAH
Explore a diseased town where everything is unusual. Strange boxes that emit hypnotic static appeared in town. Some citizens, including Sarah, have been absorbed by this mysterious object and never come back.

Boreal Tenebrae was nominated for Best Art Direction and Best Narrative at the Canadian Game Awards 2021.

In this version of the game, you will get the key to the basement of Sarah's house and find out what is hidden there.

This bundle includes the Artbook and the original soundtrack DLC.

KEY FEATURES:
• Classic retro-style adventure
• Horror elements and gore
• Story-driven quests with multiple characters
• Fixed-camera
70070000018190.intro: Boreal Tenebrae will take you on a retro-style adventure, with a mysterious atmosphere and horror elements. The game is inspired by 90s classics and the best TV series.
70070000018190.name: Boreal Tenebrae Deluxe Premium Edition

70070000018204.description:
Even the tiniest coin can prove vital in this adventure. Remember – the only weapon at your disposal is your mind!

WHAT’S THE POINT?

Dive into the past of the post-apocalyptic world of Bifrostia and those who led it to ruin. Why do they want the RO-2 unit? Before you find that out, you need to make a daring escape from under their noses.

DON’T TRUST THE RUST

The rusted city of Ilgrot is not the best place to live. Especially, if you find yourself with the wrong droid, at the worst possible moment. Make a run for it and “point & click” your way to safety. Escape this devastated land!

Along with the main game, you get access to the artbook.

KEY FEATURES:

— A classic Point & Click formula
— Demanding puzzles
— Logical solutions
— Unique aesthetic
— A gear punk ambiance
70070000018204.intro: Mechanic 8230: Escape from Ilgrot is a puzzle point & click adventure, set in the ruined city of Ilgrot. Use anything you can find to progress through the story.
70070000018204.name: Mechanic 8230: Escape From Ilgrot Ultimate Edition

70070000018205.description:
The perfect bundle for music lovers that allows you to customize your playing session and create your own playlists.

Now, you can create your favourite playlists with all your available YOGA MASTER tracks. Your yoga session will be even more pleasant!

In addition, you can listen to your playlists even just to relax your mind and create an emotional and meditative environment.

The Celestial Harmonies DLC also comes with a bonus of 10 new tracks and 10 new natural sound effects!

With the Celestial Harmonies DLC, finding your personal harmony between body and mind will be as easy as ever. 

Experience the emotion of great meditative music with Celestial Harmonies audio player!
70070000018205.intro: YOGA MASTER Celestial Harmonies Dive into great meditative music with the new audio player DLC of YOGA MASTER: Celestial Harmonies.
70070000018205.name: YOGA MASTER Celestial Harmonies Bundle

70070000018212.description:
Jet udders

You are an animal rocket. Launch yourself and don't get shot down.

New goodies every hour

Play with the claw machine every hour, or after flying through enough levels. Get a new look for the cow with different headgear or projectiles.

Fly and shoot

Spin and change the direction of your flight. Shoot enemies with a stream of white drink to make them as gentle as sheep.

Higher, faster, forward

Use the milk or other liquids to fly away, push physical obstacles or stop your enemies. Crash through windows, gain speed and reach the finish line. Shuffle your hooves and don't hold back.

With this bundle, you get three new headgear - a banana, an eggshell, and a crown.

Key Features:

- more than 20 cows to collect
- more than 100 levels
- shooting a stream of milk and more
- cute graphics in pastel colors
- rhythmic soundtrack in hip-hop and funky disco style
70070000018212.intro: Soar through the air and don't get milked in this cute game.
70070000018212.name: THAT'S A COW Complete Edition

70070000018221.description:
HENTAI IS ART

Sink into the familiar anime art style of Hentai World. Progress through the story by solving all puzzles. These lovely girls will keep you company.

INCREASING DIFFICULTY

You need to stay focused to truly enjoy the journey ahead. The difficulty will increase depending on the "outfit" of the girl you're helping out. Every success on your part will make them happier!

In this bundle, you will see Rose in her new feline look.

Key Features:

- Hand-drawn Hentai art
- Relaxing music track
- Almost 50 art pieces to unlock
- Simple gameplay mechanics
- Unique premise
70070000018221.intro: Feast your eyes with Akane, Rose, and Nanami in the most sensual puzzle game experience Nintendo Switch™ has to offer.
70070000018221.name: Hentai World Special Edition

70070000018224.description:
Be a master of fishing

Meet the locals and get your tools. Sit down or stand and wait for pike, salmon, and other smaller or bigger fish to swallow the hook. 
Show everyone your trophies. Catch fish and artifacts with a fishing net or a suitable rod.

Learn more

Valuable knowledge will allow you to complete the biology report successfully.

Relax and unwind. Feel the climate and peaceful, quiet atmosphere of the island.

This bundle includes eleven colors for your simple fishing rod and for your fishing net.

Key Features:

 - More than 50 species of fish
 - 3 different fishing techniques
- No time limits (play at your own pace)
70070000018224.intro: Visit the remarkable Isle of Jura and catch some delicious fish!
70070000018224.name: Isle of Jura Fishing Trip Special Edition

70070000018225.description:
Feel even more flow than before! With the arrival of the final DLC for Urban Flow - Streets Supplement, we present you the complete bundle with all expansion packs. 

Content included in collection:

Expansion Pack
Winter Expansion Pack
London Rules
Streets Supplement

Note: this pack does not include “Urban Flow” base game
70070000018225.name: Urban Flow Ultimate DLC Pack

70070000018229.description:
You'll be able to chat with attractive girls, know their engaging storylines, receive spicy pictures, and solve Match-3 Puzzles to unlock new and cool pick-up lines for your waifu!

Eroblast: Waifu Dating Sim - 37 Waifus features:
- 37 romanceable women to meet
- 200+ hot pics to unlock
- over 30 routes to go with each waifu, with between 5.000 to 10.000 words each
- over 400 original match-3 Puzzles
- 45+ hours of gameplay so get ready for more flirting and pics!

Browse hot profiles and start a romance. Each girl you meet unveils a mix of storytelling, visuals and desires, from bishoujo women to anime klutz. Exchange intimate messages and flirty selfies, use cool pick-up lines and ask provocative questions - every choice you make will shape the outcome of your relationships.

Cannot take romance to another level? Solve puzzles and reach your true potential as a pick-up artist! With over 400 handcrafted levels and neat mechanics, expect addictive gameplay that goes far beyond basic blast puzzles. 

Uncover the interesting stories behind each waifu, unlock pictures, but be aware, some of these pictures are quite spicy so viewer discretion is advised ;)
70070000018229.intro: We found 37 Hot Anime Girls in your area
70070000018229.name: Eroblast: Waifu Dating Sim - 37 Waifus

70070000018232.description:
Urban Flow is a game about the subtle beauty of city streets filled with cars moving in perfect harmony. But such order does not happen all by itself - the city needs YOU to control the traffic lights and to make sure everything goes smoothly. That means no crashes, no jams. Everything will run perfectly - as long as you stay focused!

Immerse yourself in a beautiful, hand-crafted, low-poly world to discover the enormous satisfaction of watching the hundreds of tiny, colorful cars flowing through the streets – all while listening to the chill, urban music.

Over 100 levels, each with its own busy intersection. You have one job: operate the lights and keep it safe.

Party Game (even if you party all alone!)
-----
 Play by yourself or with friends in scalable drop-in, drop-out local co-op mode for two, three, or four players!
You can help your friends or be a little rascal and spread the chaos!

Avoid accidents by paying close attention to special vehicles and to the other players. Special vehicles include the ambulance, which can’t wait for long, and the tank – which will plow through anything in its way.

Don’t want to play the campaign?
-----
 Try our score-based Endless Mode or the Chill Mode - where you play for as long as you want, no rush and no score - only you and the music. Urban Flow is designed to be a great single player experience!

Discover various environments and weather conditions. Play with touch controls, Pro Controllers or Joy-Cons™. Complete challenges and unlock rewards.

Become one with the flow. The Urban Flow!

This bundle includes base game, Expansion Pack and Streets Supplement with:

•    Play more than 20 new stages!
•    New challenge mode offers medals - no more star system in challenge mode! You have to pass the challenge bar to pass the challenge mode stages.
•   Introducing 5 new vehicles to the streets of Urban Flow, each one unique and with its own style.
70070000018232.intro: Manage the city lights and try to avoid the chaos!
70070000018232.name: Urban Flow Silver Edition

70070000018234.description:
Lets pop & move the ball and paint - you’ve got to color and paint your way across the AMAZE maze puzzles. 

Watch out! AMAZE gets harder as you play, color and paint the maze, and fill in puzzles!

Painting the maze puzzles sounds easy, but you have to be super strategic to color and fill every square.

Make sure you fill in puzzles COMPLETELY! If you don’t fill even one square, you’re stuck in the paint maze FOREVER!

Lets pop this maze with color!

Game Features:
- relaxing Classic mode
- tense Time Rush mode
- puzzling Limited Moves mode
- two player variants of each game mode
- hundreds of levels to paint and many colorful balls to unlock

In this edition you get content from the base game and Level Pack 1 DLC which includes:
-extra 150 levels in Classic mode
-additional 50 levels in Limited Moves
70070000018234.name: Amaze! Relax Edition

70070000018236.description:
Pinball FX is digital pinball evolved. Get the highest score on tables inspired by the biggest brands in entertainment. New tables arrive frequently!

Challenge your skills in this pinball and rhythm fusion table, which captures the wacky atmosphere and killer soundtrack of the acclaimed rogue-like. Stop the NecroDancer once more, as you use your flippers to battle bosses and acquire the Golden Lute. 

- Zone in on the zones and boss around the bosses to advance and collect points
- Battle Coral Riff, King Conga and more legendary bosses to earn diamonds
- Follow the flow of music with your combos and boost your multiplier
- Freddie has what you need! Spend your diamonds for weapons and hearts
- Face the NecroDancer in a multiball Wizard Mode for the Golden Lute
70070000018236.name: Pinball FX + Crypt of the NecroDancer Pinball Bundle

70070000018238.description:
Shovel your way to success: go underground and dig for treasure like a mole on a mission. But don't worry, you won't get stuck in a hole - unless you forget to hire workers to boost your digging empire.

Our new animal companions are here to take your gameplay to the next level by providing you with new bonuses such as increased basket capacity and faster experience gain. With Working animals DLC you'll be able to collect more items and level up faster than ever before!

And as a bonus, we're giving you +500 diamonds to help you get started. Use them to buy one of these amazing creatures and start experiencing the benefits right away.

Game Features:
- dig, shovel, excavate, burrow and dredge a hole
- mine gems and earn money to unearth more holes
- hire workers to enable idle play
- use powerups to speedup mining or buy pets for permanent buffs
- build monuments for your glory
- play with your friend to dig even deeper!
70070000018238.intro: Join the adventure, hire miners and dig for a treasure. Unleash new bonuses and dominate the game
70070000018238.name: Dig Deep: Chunky Edition

70070000018239.description:
Pour the potion into the cauldron, throw in the clover, bone and feather, stir and voila - you have a cute Mixie!

Combine other ingredients to create Mixies with different features: winged, horned, spotted, furry... the possibilities are endless.

Let your Mixie friends explore the mysterious island, find hidden treasures, repair the magical portal and collect new ingredients to create even more adorable pets. Over time, you might even discover a way to combine Mixies with each other.

Mystical Mixing is an enchanting simulation game that will immerse you in a world of magic, alchemy and wonder. So grab your cauldron and start the adventure!

In this edition you will also receive:
- five mysterious elements that will allow you to create a Mixie with new special features and colors.
- 30 speedup potions to help your Mixies explore the island and find treasures even faster.
- the most powerful wand to create stronger Mixies
- a magic frog

A party game with simple controls anyone can enjoy!
Pass around the Joy-Con™ and play with up to six players!

70070000018299.description:
Many adventures await!
Once upon a time, two children, a boy, and a girl found two unique toys - a robot and an alpacorn. These magically came to life to become our heroes' best friends! Together they experience amazing stories about friendship, helping others, and the joy of life!

Comics to color!
From the beginning of the XX century, coloring books are a great way for children to spend their time! Not only young ones will raise their creativity, learn manual skills but also discover colors and shapes! It is also a good way to settle the nerves, calm down and relax for energetic kiddos!

Complete experience
In the Comics library, you’ll find 92 great illustrations and the possibility to create your comic book!

Prologue
Check how our adventures start! Play in space with the robot or discover how the princess from the faraway kingdom and her favorite alpacorn are spending their free time.

Time for the Hero and the Robot
Together with the boy and the robot, we’ll go on many adventures: we meet a dinosaur who likes candy, enjoy a sea trip, and try to save a playful cat. All that in many surprising places!

My Friend, Alpacorn
This time we will accompany a girl and her unusual friend - Alpacorn (half alpaca, half unicorn). We’ll travel to the land of sweets, into the deeps of the sea to become mermaids and play on the snow and even explore space!

Drawing Without Borders
Create what’s comes to your mind! You have 8 blank comics to fill in this one - use painting tools to create your adventures! Create new characters, throw in cute animals, and make up amazing stories! Oh, and remember to add comic book stickers!

This bundle lets you try out the new whiteboard set and drawings.

Features:
— Great fun for children - and an excellent way to introduce them to comics.
— 23 stories, each consists 4 graphics - making a total of 92 coloring pages!
— Best tool for children to express their creativity - while improving their motor skills and awareness of colors and shapes.
— Beautiful drawings - created by an artist with many years of experience in making illustrations for children.
— Stickers!
70070000018299.intro: Comic Coloring Book - Complete Edition is fun for big and small, especially for young, creative fans of comic books! Enjoy adventures, use different drawing tools and create!
70070000018299.name: Comic Coloring Book Complete Edition: DRAW Ultimate

70070000018321.description:
EASY TO PLAY
Play with family and friends! Controls are intuitive, so simply move like you'd usually do while swimming and push forward. Swap your swimming style at any point for some extra fun.

REACH YOUR GOAL
Play with your friends or challenge yourself. Complete daily goals to improve your health and do your best to unlock every achievement.

ENJOY YOURSELF
Remember to swim at your own pace, and make time for some much needed breaks. Revel in the healthiest gameplay loop in your entire life.

This bundle includes a new character - an adorable clownfish.

KEY FEATURES:

- cute characters

- change characters and style at any time

70070000018324.description:
You'll be able to chat with attractive girls, know their engaging storylines, receive spicy pictures, and solve Match-3 Puzzles to unlock new and cool pick-up lines for your waifu!

In this bundle you get content from the base game and Playful Pack which includes:
- 21 romanceable women to meet
- 120+ hot pics to unlock
- over 30 routes to go with each waifu, with between 5.000 to 10.000 words each
- 280 levels to beat
- 25+ hours of gameplay so get ready for flirting and pics!

Browse hot profiles and start a romance. Each girl you meet unveils a mix of storytelling, visuals and desires, from bishoujo women to anime klutz. Exchange intimate messages and flirty selfies, use cool pick-up lines and ask provocative questions - every choice you make will shape the outcome of your relationships.

Cannot take romance to another level? Solve puzzles and reach your true potential as a pick-up artist! With over 200 handcrafted levels and neat mechanics, expect addictive gameplay that goes far beyond basic blast puzzles. 

Uncover the interesting stories behind each waifu, unlock pictures, but be aware, some of these pictures are quite spicy so viewer discretion is advised ;)
70070000018324.intro: We found 21 Hot and Playful Anime Girls in your area

70070000018326.description:
Take on a series of epic battles against powerful bosses. Unlock new abilities and power-ups and become the ultimate warrior. Dodge a barrage of laser beams, and explosions and make sure YOU are the last one standing.

With its vibrant graphics, pulse-pounding soundtrack, and intuitive controls, Mixx Island Remix is a game that's easy to pick up but hard to put down. 

Whether you're a seasoned gamer or a newcomer to the world of side-scrolling games, you'll find plenty to love in this thrilling adventure.

In this bundle, in addition to the main game, you will get access to a new summer island.

Key Features:

- 2D World
- High-action gameplay
- Rewarding gameplay loop
- Cute characters
- Astounding soundtrack
- Anime style aesthetic
70070000018326.intro: Mixx Island Remix Plus is a high-energy, action-packed shooter set in a fantastic 2D world. Gather your wits, sharpen your reflexes, and prepare for the ultimate challenge.
70070000018326.name: Mixx Island: Remix Plus Extended Edition

70070000018336.description:
Sort, stack, and organize household objects into just the right spot in A Little to the Left, a tidy puzzle game with a mischievous cat who likes to shake things up!
 
•	Puzzles hidden among household objects.
•	Multiple solutions make for intuitive and satisfying puzzle design.
•	A puzzle unique for you every day with The Daily Tidy Delivery.
•	Perfect for casual puzzle game fans and those who get a jolt of satisfaction from a well organized space.

Which way should the clock hands point? How to arrange the eggs? Who put so many stickers on this fruit?!? Come enjoy a calming world with an observational puzzle game with surprises around every corner. With charming illustrations and surprising scenarios, A Little to the Left is satisfying and curious with 75+ delightful puzzles to discover. Keep your eye out for a mischievous cat who has an inclination for chaos!
 
And now introducing to you... The Daily Tidy Delivery! With the Daily Tidy, you’ll get a puzzle delivered EVERY DAY with a variation on one of our favourite puzzles that’s unique to you. You’ll earn fun badges for playing too! If only tidying in real life was this rewarding.

Sort, stack, and organize household objects into particular arrangements in A Little to the Left: Cupboards & Drawers. Prepare to clean out the cabinets and secret compartments of the home with even more charming illustrations, surprising scenarios, and 25 delightful new Cupboards & Drawers themed puzzles to discover. 

Key Features:
•	25 new puzzles: a mixture of Cupboard & Drawers themed levels and traditional organization levels.
•	Puzzles nested within puzzles.
•	New functionality: Multiple steps to organizing within a single level.
•	Secret compartments!
•	Multiple drawers that are opened/closed within a level, requiring a player to move objects between them.
70070000018336.name: A Little to the Left Cupboards & Drawers DLC Bundle

70070000018347.description: Clumsy Rush: Ultimate Guys Happy Edition is a fun-centric party game which throws you (along with your friends) into a series of challenges and races throughout randomly generated tracks. Enjoy new decorations and get ready for loads of fun.
70070000018347.intro: Dive deep into a new adventure in Clumsy Rush: Ultimate Guys.
70070000018347.name: Clumsy Rush: Ultimate Guys Happy Edition

70070000018348.description:
The demon world invades humanity every 500 years. The Wolf Demon has been bullying the Kingdom of Vestus and it seems that there is no hope. But there’s one hero who can put an end to it - you - a nameless warrior with a sword in hand. What are you waiting for? 

CLASSIC EXPERIENCE 
Swords and Bones is a game inspired by 80s and 90s classics. Travel back to your childhood, fight through levels filled with monsters, avoid traps and collect power-ups & trophies in this dark medieval fantasy world. 

PIXEL ART VISUALS 
Sword and Bones is made in an art style that resembles 16-bit graphics. The dark and beautiful pixel art visuals are reminiscent of old gems of the genre. You’ll get shivers down your spine. 

CHIPTUNE MUSIC 
The music you’ll hear while travelling through these unfriendly lands emphasizes a gloomy atmosphere and turns up the fun. Get carried away by flawless retro midi sounds. 

It’s time to defeat all the monsters and restore order in the kingdom of men! 

This bundle includes 2 DLC: the Brave and the Spooky Skin.

KEY FEATURES:
- Over 50 levels full of action
- 16-bit style visuals 
- Power-ups to collect 
- Cool bosses to defeat
- Atmospheric chiptune music 
- Two endings to discover
70070000018348.intro: Grab the sword and defend the Kingdom of Vestus in an adventure full of action in the spirit of classic retro games.
70070000018348.name: Swords & Bones Definitive Edition

Your only job is to take orders, prepare food and serve to as many customers as possible.

Fulfill your dream of becoming the tycoon of the best food trucks in the city!

IN FOOD TRUCK TYCOON YOU WILL FIND:

NOTE: to play the Multiplayer Mode DLC, each player will need their own set of Joy-Con™ or an additional Nintendo Switch™ Pro Controller.

HENTAI IS ART

INCREASING DIFFICULTY

- Simple gameplay mechanics
- Unique premise

70070000018369.description:
Johnny Trigger – International Man of Mayhem!

Stylish, deadly and smooth as a billiard ball, Johnny Trigger is a man on a mission in this non-stop platform shooter game where the action never ends.

Do you have what it takes to bring down the underground world of the mafia? 
“Less talk, more bullets” – that’s Johnny’s motto as he runs, jumps, spins, slides and keeps on shooting till every bad guy’s bitten the dust.

Dive straight in and get shooting! Johnny Trigger’s short but immensely satisfying levels make it the perfect action game to fill a short break.
And if you’ve got a little more time, there’s so much to collect and a new challenge round every corner.

This action-packed experience includes content from the base game and 6 DLCs:
- 6 new skins: Lunatic, Butcher, Avenger, Hunter, Johnnybee and Hotshot
- 6 new weapons: Showtime, Vengeance, Hurricane, Triforce, Bulletstorm and Sawed-off
- 4500 additional gemms to buy other currencies 
- 175 additional puzzles to unlock more comic graphics
- 65 additional keys to open locked doors in base
- 150 additional hammers to unlock another upgrades in base
- 35000 additional money to buy or draw weapons and skins in shops

70070000018369.name: Johnny Trigger: Definitive Edition

Our brains are the most important tools of the XXI century. Do your child a favor, and give thema gift that will help them reach their full potential.

Let them become masters of their minds with 2 DLC packs: one with colorful covers and the first with different cards!

Key Features

– Improves memory
– Adorable Cards
– Adjustable difficulty level
– Relaxing music
– 8 card designs
– 20 difficulty levels
70070000018371.intro: Help your child harness the hidden potential of their mind. Use these colorfull cards to improve their memory skills.

Pick your favorite

Choose one of the heros and challenge other players in this family-friendly version of Chess. Thanks to the cartoony graphics, this variation can be enyojed by people of all ages.

Hone your skills

If you want to improve on your own, try out one of five difficulty options and play with an NPC. Find your favorite opening and improve with every game. If you are looking for a real challenge try out the expert mode.

This bundle includes 3 DLC skins for the chessboard.

Key features

- local multiplayer
- family friendly
- balanced gameplay
- charming aesthetic
- invigorating music track
70070000018373.intro: Prepare for loads of fun with this cartoon version of the most popular board game in the world.
70070000018373.name: Family Chess Magnificent Edition

70070000018381.description:
Pixel Paint 2 is a sequel to an extremely popular game by the same name. The rules are quite simple. Put your mind at ease, follow the numbers, and fill out every last pixel with the right color. 

It's your first step in becoming an amazing pixel artist. Choose a theme you like and sink into the wonderful world of pixels. 

Choose from a wide range of drawings, and expand your pixel art gallery with the Party DLC!

Key Features:

-Dozens of illustrations to choose from
-Relaxing gameplay
-Adorable characters
-Easy to play
-Simplistic Design
-Charming Pixel Drawings
70070000018381.intro: Experience the pixelated sensation, beloved by thousands of people. Discover a coloring book, unlike any other.
70070000018381.name: Pixel Paint 2 Ultimate Edition

-Cosmetics set (Magical Makeup,Hair Catalog)

*Each DLC included in this set is also sold individually. Please be careful not to make double purchases.

70070000018390.description:
From some of the best puzzle designers in the world comes the Draknek and Friends Puzzle Bundle, a collection of six of the best puzzle games in the last decade. With dozens of hours of fun, this bundle is a must-have for puzzle fans.

Set your belongings on fire on a beautiful voxel art puzzle island in Bonfire Peaks, the debut publishing project from Draknek and Friends.

Explore the museum of Human Englandland in A Monster’s Expedition, the critically beloved open world puzzle game. Players of all skill levels can enjoy hundreds of islands - some right in front of you, others well off the beaten track for true puzzle lovers

Patrick's Parabox is an award-winning puzzle game that explores a unique recursive system of boxes within boxes within boxes within boxes. Learn to manipulate the world's structure by pushing boxes into and out of each other. Wrap your head around what happens when a box contains itself, and learn to use infinity to your advantage. Explore many more mechanics and recursive twists as you delve deeper and deeper into the system. It's boxes all the way down.

In Cosmic Express, create pathways to navigate the galaxy’s most awkward space colony. It's cute, harder than it looks, and guaranteed to give you hours of challenging fun across hundreds of levels. 

In A Good Snowman is Hard to Build, players can continue exploring the world of A Monster’s Expedition while rolling up snowballs to become snowfriends. The easiest and most accessible of the four games, this game is a delight for all ages.

In Sokobond, move atoms to form increasingly complex molecules through over one hundred levels of challenging puzzles in Draknek’s first commercial release.
70070000018390.intro: Six puzzle masterpieces for one low price!
70070000018390.name: Draknek and Friends Puzzle Bundle

with

You can exchange precious Wicked Bloodstone found in the dungeon at the Muscle Hall in Yano Market for several powerful weapons.

*Each DLC included in this set is also sold individually. Please be careful not to make double purchases.
